column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Word to the wise: If you're with a huge group
column2: make sure to collaborate on your orders.  I swear the food just keep coming at us.  Literally
column3: the entire group would say "Oh my god
column4: I'm so full" and then...more food.  "Oh my god
column5: I'm so full" and then...more food.  I made the mistake of ordering the paella
column6: which I don't think was worth $20 (I'd much rather order 2 tapas)
column7: and it came at the end of the meal after people had said "Oh my god
